message.body:
Sam:
When will you be in today to return your equipment. I was in early at 6:45 am in the event you stopped by after the red eye.
Please stop in earl

y this afternoon since I will be leaving around 3 PM today and I need to get the equipment since Pete will be leaving in the next half hour.
Thanks.
Jo
Be in around 1 pm. Need to hand in expense reports and submit time sheet too.
Hey joe, I'm on my way down now. Got held up.
